solution_line_template: Sunny has a total of {initial_cakes} - {cakes_given_away} = <<{initial_cakes}-{cakes_given_away}={remaining_cakes}>>{remaining_cakes} cakes
Sunny will use a total of {remaining_cakes} * {candles_per_cake} = <<{remaining_cakes}*{candles_per_cake}={total_candles}>>{total_candles} candles
